original_text: A tabernacle was set up. In its first room were the lampstand and the table with its consecrated bread; this was called the Holy Place.
korean_text: 예비한 첫 장막이 있고 그 안에 등잔대와 상과 진설병이 있으니 이는 성소라 일컫고

sentences.original_text: were the lampstand and the table

sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 거룩한 떡이 놓여 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: this was called the Holy Place
